results.title: Fer and FerT Govern Mitochondrial Susceptibility to Metformin and Hypoxic Stress in Colon and Lung Carcinoma Cells
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ impaired mitochondrial functioning that was accompanied by @<m>DISEASE_604273</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:604273 @@@ATP@@@ deficiency and robust death in SW @GENE_FER @GENE_2241 @@@Fer@@@/FerT and H @GENE_FER @GENE_2241 @@@Fer@@@/FerT cells compared to the parental @CELLLINE_CVCL:0547 @@@SW620@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0060 @@@H1299@@@ cells.
